short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gentle reminders displayed on YouTube, Facebook and Twitter to help you beat procrastination.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We often spend more time mindlessly browsing YouTube, Facebook and Twitter than we want to. This extension shows you gentle reminders on those websites after 25 minutes (or a customized amount of time) to help you get back to work and avoid procrastination.
